Articles.Content:
Yeah, it looks better than mine (the craft that I hyperedited around HD101ba was tinted blood red because of the star).

So, we need to add templates to each of the planets, right?

Imgur isn't letting me post, yea, we need to apply templates, look at the configs to find the appropriate one. I also found an old white dwarf I had lying around, we may find a use for it.

**Nevermind looking at the configs. Now that I look at the newer ones, none of the templates were saved... Just a quick question, how often do you update your files with the ones that we upload? Or did I not provide the new files that had the templates?**

Also. I LOVE THIS.

![eXLkulh.png](http://i.imgur.com/eXLkulh.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-04T19:07:03Z" title="07/04/2015 07:07  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 4, 2015</time> by Hammersamatom**

Got the templates on them for each of the planets except for Kosarn, Alo, and Mina since i don't know how to place the template code in a side-scroll config.

Here's the Updated stuff from my end:

[Astro & Dude's Planet Pack](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/q7wpf1qhvuk7ro1/AABw9OIvdoZv2Nsf6gKUn916a?dl=0)

Don't worry, I added the templates to about everything.

- - - Updated - - -

Edit: I don't think you gave the template configs.
Like the sun?
It's awesome, but it needs some more insane flowing flares that go farther outward.
Might not be entirely possible, I could be completely wrong, but the image files are at a small resolution, with the largest flares in the image going near the top.

Okay.

The only things that we need to fix are:

1. the Additional moons Templates

2. Tyrok

And I think those two things are it - after that we can get back to creating planets - right?

Btw, the templates that you put in were missing a few lines. Also added the templates to moons.

**Pease download this version, it's a direct fix, without some of those lines, we would have broken planets that looked like the stock ones.**

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/y2czbyu05k48el5/Astro.zip?dl=0)

Other than planet textures, Amarius said that he was working on that, yea. Let's focus our efforts on Kinern, it needs a few friends, if I do say so myself.

- - - Updated - - -

I suggest huge rings. Perhaps with a few planets hidden within them?

Alfons bugged out for me, but at least I can see Mysterio from 202Ev68...

Seriously.

- - - Updated - - -

I will add some moons to Kinern (maybe one will have a small ring system and maybe a small moon).

Any news on Barycenters?

Well, I'm trying... Limited results.

Any details on what exactly bugged out, is Alfons there?

**Found whats wrong, my bad...**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-04T20:02:14Z" title="07/04/2015 08:02  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 4, 2015</time> by Hammersamatom**

Here's some images as to what happens:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/pom3j)

What the heck...

Oh...

You have my permission to smack me over the head.

I forgot a majority of the PQS mods for Alfons.
No worries - it happens to even the best of us.
What was your altitude when moving around Alfons? I think I might have fixed it.

Around 145 - 150km.

- - - Updated - - -

Dang, Alfons has an SOI of 705km and orbits a bit too close to MTM-4 and Asterix for comfort.

Yep, fixed it. Was able to land.

Here's the fixed config: [Config](https://www.dropbox.com/s/onkimnjqsbhhm3e/Alfons.cfg?dl=0)
Alright, I'll test Alfons out now.
Ok, so a little question, for testing purpose. Which pack I can download?

[Pack download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/y2czbyu05k48el5/Astro.zip?dl=0)

[Fixed Alfons Config (Replace Alfons Config with this!)](https://www.dropbox.com/s/onkimnjqsbhhm3e/Alfons.cfg?dl=0)
Thanks
Okay, I listed Alfons as a Dwarf Planet, not a moon, now where the heck am I supposed to put it? What do you guys think?

Alfons works properly!

Either make it a Dres Trojan or our Eris analogue.

Simply make it a bit bigger than Eeloo and add a Dysnomia analogue.

Dres Trojan it is. Although it won't be a trojan, but it will have a similar orbit, and they won't be able to collide.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-04T21:59:08Z" title="07/04/2015 09:59  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 4, 2015</time> by Hammersamatom**

Alright then.

What's the case with Tyrok - we still need to fix it, right?
I've seen it happen before. I have not idea of how to fix it, but I'll try...
